oneOf.purpose: Defines a simple ballot type in which a user's ADA balance is used to inform their voting power.
Defines a ballot type in which a user's ADA balance which is delegted to a specific stake pool is used to inform their voting power.

PoolId.purpose: Require that voters be delegated to the specified pool ID (bech32)

PolicyId.purpose: Users need to have at least one token from any of the policy IDs. Votes count only once per token. Vote weight is determined by number of unique assets.

items.purpose: Policy ID that enables users with tokens to vote
